entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
